function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Substantial decrease in environmental emissions from remote meetings and events","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction of day-to-day mobility impacting various sectors such as entertainment, tourism, and manufacturing","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic pressures and workload leading to workers being pushed into hazardous work conditions, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction projects delayed or temporarily stopped due to budget cuts and income decrease","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decline in revenue for construction projects due to impacts of covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of construction activity due to the socio-economic-environmental impacts of covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preparation for a larger variety of possible disruptions in the construction industry","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unforeseen impact of pandemics on the construction industry and end users","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge, experience, and readiness in managing pandemics","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacted medical practice","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of included studies from specific geographic areas","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of transmission through sharing of toilets","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compliance with hand hygiene is likely to remain an obstacle, especially among physicians.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission of coronavirus in hospital and family settings.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human behavior and lifestyle affecting the spread of contagious diseases within the built environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 facilitated by connectivity","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact of high unemployment and social distancing","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental impacts from changed behaviors and economic recovery","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of in-depth research on measuring connectivity in cities and its impact on the spread of pandemics.","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low number of studies examining the impact of density on highly contagious new infections.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial anxiety leading to homeowners avoiding selling their homes due to uncertainties caused by covid-19","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for touchless and smart home products may lead to privacy and data security risks.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential bankruptcy for engineering and construction companies","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain disruptions and workflow issues in the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital platforms for cultural resources, municipal services, and participation may lead to increased virtual interactions and dependence.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential long-term coexistence with covid-19 leading to ongoing public health concerns and the need for sustainable recovery strategies.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changing trust in local authorities","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis-response measures may discourage expansion and maintenance of housing stock, leading to barriers restricting mobility and impacting financial and economic resilience.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cities may suffer different consequences of the health crisis, impacting their recovery options and possibilities based on their trade openness, labor market structure, and industrial composition.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic costs to businesses and people due to social distancing measures","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in living preferences leading to depopulation of large cities","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary research on the impact of housing policies on covid-19 spread","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased mental health issues due to restricted outdoor recreation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for comfortable and high-quality housing due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Housing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Globalization and interconnectivity conventions could be challenged, leading to changes in politics and multi-scalar policies.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The pandemic could be an opportunity and impetus to move away from unsustainable practices towards more sustainable ones.","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excessive food consumption","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shifts in behavior towards pro-environmental approach are driven by threat and coping appraisal","category":"Environment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic can push individuals towards environmental responsibility","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic speeding up progress towards social fairness and environment protection","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse effects of counter-pandemic measures on sustainable development goals","category":"Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited application of comprehensive data analysis methods for understanding disease spread and its impact on built environments.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of digital risk monitoring and health reporting leading to undetected spread of contagious diseases in construction and work sites.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in work and leisure locations due to covid-19","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to prolonged lockdowns and close living conditions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic policies on housing sector and green buildings","category":"Housing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ecological fallacy risk due to population-weighted assessments","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personal data on individuals infected by sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertified research findings","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlational findings instead of causal findings","category":"Education","confidence":"High"}]}
